list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor appointment management and enhance UI
Replaced manual jQuery datetimepicker with FullCalendar, refactored appointment fetching logic in models, and added a delete appointment feature. Updated views and scripts to display appointment details and integrated a new delete endpoint for better user experience.

task.summary: Default task

Refactor admin structure and update routes
Removed obsolete files and directories for clarity. Relocated key files to more appropriate locations within admin directory, updated route references accordingly, and improved error handling with a new abort function.

Add error page, chart demos, and routing logic
Added a 404 error page in `views/404.php`. Included chart demo scripts and an image asset. Implemented basic routing in `index.php` to handle admin, calendar, and patients routes.

Remove debugging echo statement
Removed an unnecessary debugging echo statement that printed the matched route. This change cleans up the output and avoids exposing internal information.

Refactor partials directory structure in admin views
Renamed and relocated partials specific to admin views for better organization. Adjusted requires in admin views to reflect the new paths, ensuring modularity and maintainability.

Add partials for head, nav, header, footer
Created new partials: head, nav, header, and footer in the views/partials directory. Updated homepage.php to utilize these partials, improving code modularity and maintainability.

Update primary color and sync workspace metadata
Changed the primary RGB color in styles.css from 13, 110, 253 to 26, 188, 156. Also, updated workspace.xml with new partials metadata for improved modularity and maintainability.

Remove modal from admin patients view
The patients view now displays the title in Bulgarian. Additionally, the modal popup for displaying details has been completely removed from the page.

Update register form and controller for doctor and regular users
Changed the page title to "Register" on the registration view. Added form fields and backend handling for doctor-specific registration, including title, specialty, and city.

Add doctor login functionality
Introduced a new Doctor model with a login method. Updated the login controller to use the doctor login feature and removed temporary debugging calls.

Update redirection logic to use HTTP_ORIGIN
Changed the redirect function to dynamically use the originating server's address instead of a fixed path. This ensures that redirection works correctly across different environments and domains.

Add user login and session management logic
Enhanced the login controller by adding user login support alongside doctor login. Included logic to check and store login status in the session, redirecting users based on their roles. Updated the Doctor model to return user data instead of a boolean for successful login.

Refactor routes and controller paths using middleware
Updated controller paths to use "Controllers" directory for consistency. Added middleware support to routes and ensured methods return instances for chaining.

Add middleware classes and integrate into routes
Introduced Auth and Guest middleware classes to manage session-based access control. Integrated these middleware checks into the login and register routes, replacing placeholder values with appropriate middleware keys. This improves route security and session management.

Add middleware support to router
Integrate Middleware class in router. Modify "only" method to return $this and ensure the middleware is resolved before requiring the controller file in routeTo method.

Remove extra blank lines from admin homepage view
Two unnecessary blank lines were removed from the admin homepage view file. This change enhances the readability and cleanliness of the codebase.

Implement user session management and logout functionality
Added user-specific session handling in login, consistent session key updates, and logout processing. Modified navigation to conditionally display login, register, and logout options based on user session state. Simplified route access with middleware checks for guests.

Refactor model and view naming conventions
This commit renames several models and views to singular form for consistency. Additionally, it replaces hardcoded options in the homepage form with dynamic data fetched from the models. This change improves code readability and maintainability.

Fix require path and remove debug code
Corrected the path for the Doctor model and removed unnecessary debug code. These changes ensure proper loading of the model and clean up the code for better readability.

Add admin_doctor middleware for admin routes
Integrated the AdminDoctor middleware to restrict access to admin routes. Updated the Middleware map and route definitions to use the new middleware class. AdminDoctor class checks if the user is a doctor, redirecting to the homepage if not.

Add AuthenticatedUser middleware and reorganize files
Implemented new AuthenticatedUser middleware to handle session-based authentication checks. Reorganized controller files into authentication and appointments directories for better structure and maintainability. Updated routes and Middleware map to reflect these changes, ensuring proper access control and routing.

Refactor appointment management and enhance UI
Replaced manual jQuery datetimepicker with FullCalendar, refactored appointment fetching logic in models, and added a delete appointment feature. Updated views and scripts to display appointment details and integrated a new delete endpoint for better user experience.
